name: Erotic Museum of Barcelona (Museu de l'Erotica)

reviews.text:
Pre Ordered tickets for here which we really didn't need to do as it's open pretty much all day and there were never any queues when walking past.

We went late evening after a busy day and a couple of cocktails, which I think added to the visit, had our champagne and started our tour.  The place isn't big and you can fly round it in 30 minutes if you wanted to.  Saying that the wife and I found it highly amusing looking at the displays and laughing like teenagers (which we haven't been for a long time).

If you want a cheap (9 euro and a drink included) fun way to spend an hour then pop in, its not a must see by any stretch but its something a bit different.

Very funny!!  I liked the pictures and the videos. 
One day i will come back 
I liked everything

Definitely worth the money! So funny hahahahahahaha

learn and see a lot of erotic from the past to the present. Spend an hour or so and visit this museum upstairs in a former apartment. Much to see, sometimes too much stuff making the museum full and overload. Get out with a smile.
high price, waste of money. it took just 5 minutes. small rooms, dirty and dust around. kinda boring, angry staff
Saw Marilyn in the window, couldn’t resist popping in! Really interesting museum full of credible knowledge. Would recommend to anyone, brilliant price

Amazing museum ! very interstdick ! What will see is like heart beating to the rythm of openminding and curiosity. Loose yourself in front of the wall of sadomasochism and get stunt by the amazing and famous japanese sextural art ... a must see on barcelona
A fun place to see with your friends, but you can also find interesting things about the sexual cultural
The most fun I've had in Barcelona so far. It is right in the city centre. Definitely take your SO there!! :)
Nice płace, amazing smell, Good płace to visit. I realy recomend for people who are Very open in realtionship
This is a great place to visit deffo worth it if your in the city of Barcelona would recommend to many
We weren’t sure what to expect and found this informative and fun.  Lots of “history of erotica” which, if accurate, is pretty amazing. Not a large museum and can be seen in 60-90 minutes or less.

If you don't know anything about sex surely
You have to come .
You LL find Video photos and more more thing . Just go and check it out.
Very interesting mueseum full of weird and wonderful sights. Would recommend for those looking for something different for a couple of hours!

We really enjoyed our visit. 
Surprisingly very funny and interesting
And fun. Passing a fun hour for adults

Great place. Highly recommend!!
Great staff 
Great place 
Would definitely come back !!
Thank you from England
A very interesting place, great to see all of the history of erotica and how it started. A real insight into the empowerment of erotica. Not for the faint hearted but definitely recommend.
Lots of fun to look around especially for couples! But with genuinely interesting exhibits and information too. And a very tempting shop! Would recommend
The museum was really funny and interesting and a fun thing to do with friends! Really cheap and affordable as well

This museum has the best vr/augmented reality guide I have ever seen. Point the provided iPhone at the floor marker and vr Marilyn pops up to tell you about the room you are seeing. 
Take the guide!!! I saw at least 7 other couples/tourists during my trip (Feb. Slow season) and none of them had the champagne or guide. This is one of the best museums I have ever seen, and it's enhanced by the guide.
This museum looks small but there are 14 different rooms, containing thousands of individual objects. The VR guide is essential. In addition to vr-Marilyn, there are in-depth commentaries on many of the items in the collection.
The collection spans from pre-recorded history to modern times, and covers different cultures around the world.
I included a couple of pg13 images to give you an idea of the museum.
very interesting and useful informations. i would come again in the future to check for new things if there will be any.
Fantastic and fun . We love it. Must see. People here are super helpful. We will come back soon. Thank you

Worth checking out when in the area. A lot of interesting stuff. 
Theres pictures, videos and a lot to take in
Such a great learning experience with kind staff! Tour is in English, Spanish, French, and Italian! Barcelona must see!
Never been in a museum like that, but as a first timer it was actually interesting and important to learn all aspects of sex under all point of views.
Really cool and funny, we really enjoyed it. I dont think i will visit museum like this one. I will come back.
Fun visit. Less than an hour. The champagne was nice. They have some very interesting exhibits to view.
never expected to see such a place and the experience was definitely one of a kind that’s for sure so

We are really satisfied with the exhibition, we found there many interesting informations, we found out many knowledges we haven't heard before, the staff was very nice and friendly, I found the sex machines the most interesting part of the exhibition. The informations about the famous people and their erotic fantasy were also nice. I have never seen so many various items for sexual plays. I will recommend this museum to my friends, I truly gained amazing experience.

This is a small museum up a narrow staircase off Las Ramblas and going in you may think it’s just a silly curiosity. But the inside is full of photos reproductions and relics of sex through the ages and from all over the world. Who knew porn went back to the Stone Age?! Here you get to see it! As small as it is the place is tastefully done so it doesn’t look like some creepy dudes basement and there is A LOT to take in. If you don’t read the plaques you’ll get through kinda quick but I’d say spending less than 40 minutes here is short-changing yourself because there is a lot of interesting information. 

The ticket to enter costs like a euro or two more if you want a glass of cava, which is a fun touch to offer. And there are some giant, let’s just say “body parts” to take photos with to remind you that this is still about having fun. A great stop.
Waste of money, not very good information, took 5 minutes to see it all, overpriced, rude staff not interested in helping or even acknowledging your even their. Don’t bother with this place.

Done a visit for tourism because i have preference for visit exotic and different attractions. Expositions are really interesting and the time available to visit is nice because you can visit there till midnight.

Really nice place
It’s a good and interesting museum to visit, many curiosities about sex and sexuality
Staff friendly and helpful
Went with the intention of having a giggle but it ended up being a very interesting and entertaining museum. Highly recommended
Never seen pictures of so many places in the world. Really amazing!!! And explanations e many languages. We loved it, totally recommend.
I loved it! Brilliant for something to do in Barcelona. Really interesting to see how different things have evolved. Will definitely come again x
Great staff and funky with spice. Good exhibits. Lots of pictures, sound, smells, visual, etc, have a gander.
Very informative, taboo/stigma that I felt walking in quickly disappeared. Lovely and delightful 😂😂
Such a different experience and learned such interesting things would definitely recommend if you’re in Barcelona
Great experience and staff really friendly. Would definitely recommend and learned a lot from the experience!
Very interesting museum and does not take all day to walk around. Would thoroughly recommend if In area

This place is amazing, great collection of erotic items. There are some items and pictures that make you chuckle, great laugh and a great way to spend our last evening in Barcelona, definitely recommend you pay this place a visit

Lots of things to see and very interesting as a couple to learn about the history of eroticism.

We visited as a couple and had lots of fun

An interesting collection of exhibitions on sex and sexuality, from ancient to modern times. I learnt alot about how sexualoty has been perceived over time across diffe re nt cultures. Loved the perfume used throughout the building.
It was really interesting and cool!!!  I absolutely recomend to visit it for everyone who haven’t been here before.
It was great experience. I recommend to go there. The museum was really nice and fun. Tickets price was 10€

Please educate your staff and either remove or redo the exhibit, “Prostitution during II World War!” Clearly whoever created this museum is completely misinformed and ignorant to the horrible, terrible and inhumane things the Japanese army forced comfort women to partake in. The comfort women were enslaved, raped, tortured, experimented on as if they were toys, and treated as if they were nothing. A rat was treated better than how the comfort women were treated! I am disgusted and appalled at what happened to comfort women and to see them hung up on a wall and their stories and pain degraded is shameful and greatly offensive.

⭐️Military Sexual salvery victims by Japan⭐️
⭐️Sexual salvery victims for the Japanese imperial army⭐️

you give wrong information about « War prostitution » section. you must change the name and information!

There is a worng imformation about korea.
I saw the ‘prositution’ word. it’s not true. 
They are ‘comfort woman’ and Victim of world war 2
You shouldn't distort other people's painful history.
Interesting, unique items, artistic. Worth a stop! Seeing Picasso's and Dali's work was great. Hope to come back soon!
Interesting topic. It was great to learn more about the history of erotics and also it was very vivid.
It was very interesting to learn something about the history of eroticism with the help of this Museum.
I really enjoyed my visit here! Had a lot of laughs and it was very informative and insightful. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to go
We had a great time at the museum, definitely recommend it. We booked the tickets easily online, staff are friendly 👍🏼
Fun and informative. Something for everyone. Cock, ass, nipples, big and small. Live demonstrations would have been a nice feature. Cool museum!
An interesting take on erotica throughout the years with great display of everything that is associated with sex and how was evolved. Very recommended.
Fun to be with friends, good laugh and interesting. Was cool to see some interesting facts. Favourite thing was John Lennon room
Great laughs shared with friends walking through this history lesson of sex, learnt some new things and saw some interesting positions!
Intersting facts, friendly staff and learnt heaps! John lennon wall and penis wall were some of the highlights!

As soon as I knew we were coming to Barcelona, I flagged this as a required stop. Interesting facts about erotica all over the world throughout the ages. Pretty quick to pass through and check out, definitely a must-see!
Great Laugh!!! Interesting history behind it!!! So many different facts and information. Very Educational!
Very nice experience, worth paying a visit if you have never entered a museum like this before. Highly recommend! ;)
Fun and informative, worth the entry fee, would recommend for couples to spend an hour.Open till late so great for late night exploration.
Very fun and the placards are informative. The videos playing are interesting and the live Marilyn Monroe model is adorable!
€10 is a little on the high side, but overall it’s a very interesting read into the history of eroticism especially throughout Weaterm Europe
Waste of money, nothing but pictures and a few dildos on a wall.. Walked round it in know time.. Way over priced..
Very interesting, informative and lively romp through sexual preferences of different countries and eras.  Don't go if you are easily offended!

Varied selection from multiple eras and cultures. Enlightening ♥️
Went in December with friends!!!!!
Very interesting and very funny, many Crazy stuff, but as well I learned a lot, it‘s defenetely worth it

This unique erotic museum combines the obvious things that one thinks of with erotic museums, with a fascinating tour of history and culture as they relate to the erotic.  This museum was really well-done and not at all base or grimy.  We learned a lot!
So different.. I came here with my friend while in rambla.. so much of culture and history was mentioned

Los amamos! 
It Easy fun, we have travelled all way long but never found something like this!
Congrats!
Very informative and interesting content. Lots to see, many language options. Suitable for everyone.
Super fun place, really recommend. Went with my boyfriend, loads of things to see and also try :))!!
really interesting and educating! i like it, went with my friends , a lot of languages disponible!  recomending it.
Small, but really interesting! It’s fascinating to see the various depiction of sexuality across so many cultures. For the price, I definitely recommend it.

This was just down the street from our hotel, so we came in. It is not terribly large, but had an interesting collection. Old machines, art, photos, and small figurines. Many of the items were quite old. It was clean and was not sleazy.

We stumbled upon this place after a few beers, and honestly it is the funniest thing, especially if you are slightly on the childish side!  Haha!

In all seriousness though, it was an informative visit and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves, even if we did laugh like little children most of the way around! 😂

If you in Barcelona for a few days and are near to the museum I would 100% pop in and take wonder around. 
Defo worth the money
Good exhibition, many perspectives taken into account. Very helpful personnel, not a huge crowd either. The only issue was the scent: with any scent issues, it can get to you.
Highly recommended for open minded visitors. Detailed and comprehensive collection from the ancient ages till today.

Increíble, muy interesante!
A nice, entertaining visit to discover the erotic world in history. 
Very nice visit.
Amazing place ! You must visit , I would recommend everyone to pass by if you have time , very interesting
This place is amazing and the staff is awesome. All of the exhibits were very interesting and I loved every minute of it
I had so much fun! Such helpful staff and such a great time. Love the gift shop! Great prices and the garden was my favorite

Great exhibits and staff, interesting artifacts and some funny items thrown in to giggle at. Fun with my partner but would be ideal for a stag or hen do. You can see the real life Marilyn Monroe impersonator on the balcony most days and times!

Student fee 8euro, felt that it could be a bit cheaper for a one floor exhibition. But it was really interesting to see all the different cultures featured, along with some cool and wacky sex instruments. Definitely worth a visit if you’re bored of conventional museums.

Located right on la rambla and easy to get to. There are so many fun rooms and the staff is friendly as well! We had a fun group of friends we met during our travels! Pictures are encouraged and recommended. All you friends from the cruise that didnt go will be jeaous.

There was various rooms of history on erotic sex, a shelf of various example aroma on glass to smell from. They could have done more with the famous artist like Picasso and Dali as they were put in one room due to their art work, however their human size figure was just placed there which was quite scary. I thought the other figures like Marilyn Monroe was a lot more creepier.
I found this place intriguing, found out exciting things about historical icon people when it comes about sex. I was surprised to find out such interesting things about sexual life of these people.
I am into it. Super cool to see the history of sex and the all things "taboo" in today's society. We also got free champagne, so...can't really go wrong there. Check it out!
Really interesting and informative with a very diverse selection of exhibits from all over the world.
Definitely worth the money a great look through the history of sex. Took about an hour and a half to walk through the whole thing
Nice museum with a good value for money. A lot of nice things to see. And a great couples experience.

Price is very good. We have a lot rooms to see, the atmospher is very awesome. 
The best museums in town!

Located on an upper floor of a building on La Romba this place is worth a visit (12€) if you have a curiosity for the history of human sexuality.

There are arrows and a line painted on the floor which leads you through the various rooms of the museum.  There are relatively few “devices” but many pieces of artwork and sculpture to admire and reflect on how civilizations throughout the ages have expressed their sexual interests and sexuality. 

Allow yourself about an hour to visit.  The visit ends in a sales room where you can purchase a variety of sensual clothing and “toys”

Enjoy.
Informative, interesting and eye-opening! Despite the obvious and expected smut, there is some interesting history within

Such a cool museum! Very vivid and interesting learned so many different facts!
Lots of present and historic information included too. I’d tell my friends to come back in the future!!

Was really interesting learning about John Lennon and Yoko Ono, and there were so many interesting curiosities people normally never learn anywhere else. It's very interesting seeing how it all developed till becoming what it is now! Definitely worth the visit!! Not suitable for pudic people :)
Very informative. I even get to see John Lennon's art with his wife. What surprised me were the tools used before. There was even a "seesaw" like tool
It was very interesting and worth the money. Reccomend for everyone. It is not kust about the present but goes further back in time than you think.

Wery nice and interesting place. It has a history of sex from the ancient times till our. Also, has a small sex shop inside. And a vending machine at the entrance to the exhibition, where you can get water, juice, and... condoms😏
This is  a very small museum, and   unlessd you live in a cave, you could have seen much of what is in the exhibit other places. Were it not so expensive, it would be worht a trip.
This was our first time visiting this museum and we loved it. Shows you the erotic side of humanity from the beginning of time to the present day. Definitely recommended!
Such an interesting and funny adventure would recommend for sure. It really is the peak of human evolution.
If you want to have a good time, this is the place to go, you will learn a lot and laugh a lot too...
Best experience ever! Finally you can see erotic is a thing of all times. To much tabou around that issue! Top!
Lots of interesting stuffs and pictures inside, you can learn many things about sex history and others, really nice place to visit if you have time.
Very interesting collection of old photos in black and white. The instruments (of pleasure) used in the past are amazing!
Interesting and fun visit to the erotic museum. Cheap and easy to get to. Recommend going in the afternoon or morning and then stopping by the nearby market
I was there just for fun. But I didn't noticed that the museum was so nice and all the good history behind the scenes. Amazing. Would definitely recommend this to visit
Unique experience. Worth to come and check it out for about an hour to learn about erotic history and enjoy the art. ;)
A fun stop on our short holiday to Barcelona. Really interesting old photography. We thoroughly enjoyed it
Literally one of the funniest things to do in Barcelona, well worth a little trip! Unexpected and would recommend!

Having seen 'Marilyn Monroe' waving from the window previously we decided to visit after dinner one evening. We had expected the entry to be 9 euros including a free glass of fizz plus a 2 euro discount using our hop on/off bus voucher. However, we were told entry was 10 euros (12 less 2 discount) and it didn't include any drink but we could buy one for another 2 euro. Anyway, we paid our money, posed for a photo on a giant penis and walked into the 'wall of f**cking machines'! After that it was mostly rooms of old photographs and items from various places around the world portraying the history of erotisism. Some of the info boards were quite interesting, some of the dummies quite tacky! There was also a room dedicated to Marilyn Monroe and John Lennon and Yoko Ono as well as an indoor garden where you could sit on big wicker chairs. We spent around an hour there. Nice to visit if a little overpriced to what we'd seen displayed elsewhere.
Comprehensive, immersive, and full of interesting history to learn! Definitely something to do with friends, your partner, or by yourself.
I expected this museum to be tacky. Not at all. Very well organized museum that happens to be of an erotic nature.

We were on an open top tour bus when it mentioned there was an erotic museum not far away. We thought it would be a laugh, and the price to get in wasn't too bad. When we got there, it was pretty poor. Don't get me wrong, there's some interesting pieces inside, but I found it boring. The building and rooms felt tired. There were low quality mannequins in one room, a cheap looking display in another. It felt a little like a school project... We managed to walk around the whole thing in 40 minutes. Wish we'd spent 40 minutes elsewhere!
Chanced upon this right outside of Las Ramblas. Super fun and interesting! Learned some pretty cool facts. Highly recommended!
Despite you might believe it's funny, it contains plenty of information from ancient time till now. It is great, you have to visit it.
Wow...learned some intresting things. Lots to see.  Some might thing its  immoral....not a fan of the fragrance throughout the museum.
Was a very interesting walk about, had lots of laughs and giggles! Would rev come nd if you are looking for things to do around barcelona
Very interesting as well as having all the necessary stuff to have a giggle with! 10/10 would recommend!
Great fun and very knowledgeable! Lots of interesting information especially on history! Great experience going as a couples too!
It is a cultural museum rather than a funny sexy toys etc. From Ancient Greek to Dali’s paintings. Recommended
Entertaining and open late museum, great that it is discounted by the Barcelona Card. A surprising amount of content
Would recommend a visit! Interesting and lots of giggles had! Takes approx an hour to walk around!!!
Great experience, worth a visit 👍🏼 Will take approx an hour so it is worth a quick visit for a laugh
Attended with my 2 sisters and mother, very interesting, my first experience probably not my last! gift shop is great
had a fabulous time - very informative. great to know people haven’t changed even with hundreds of years. definitely worth a visit
Unique tour to switch up things while you’re in Barcelona. Be prepared to blush!  Definitely would recommend.
Overpriced for what is it. Once you've seen one 'erotic museum' you've seen them all. Wouldn't bother, lots of other great things to do instead.

The Erotic museum as like no museum we have been to before! It gives you a brief overview of the earliest civilizations and how they treated eroticism and sex and has a lot of interesting pictures and facts to go with it. Definitely we don’t regret coming here and would recommend it to other friends coming to BCN!
This was an exciting and educational experience. A lot of historical stories and fun facts. I recomend a visit!
interesting and informative information about the history of world erotica.  I advise you to visit.  ask for an audio guide at the entrance

The museum was fun and full of unexpected things to see. Besides the major attractions, I truly enjoyed the photos of the paintings of Picasso and Dali, showing how they portrayed sex and sensuality in their art.

Spent a Friday afternoon wandering round the rooms and sat watching videos of erotica, not for the faint hearted. Machines from olden days to self satisfy and pictures taken of erotica sent to WW1 soldiers; I bet that kept their peckers up 😂

Well worth a visit.
Worth a visit, interesting place if you have an hour or two to spare. Not the usual museum though...
Cool to see the curious and interesting erotic history. There were displays of artists and celebrities. Erotica from asian, and Europe.
Exciting and fun! Definitely worth visiting if you want something different and cheeky to whilst in Barcelona!
An unique experience for 18 plus, but not necessarily! It was quite interesting too see  the erotic history.
Nice museum. Interesting exposition, different epochs, photos and sex devices. Great place to visit.
Good for a laugh but a bit on the pricey side! I probably would reccomend it, you’ll stay about half an hour max here.
We wanted to see the museum and decided to make it a activity between dinner and drinks. We spent an hour, the museum is not big, but lots of interesting things too see
Very catchy facts and photos about the history of erotism. Interesting movies and funny movies. You should comr and see!!
It has very interesting facts, some funny ones. The old movies are very funny. Overall a nice experience!
A very different type of museum. A little weird but very interesting to find about so different cultures.

They should sell the vintage war postcard replicas. 

It’s a small venue but it’s worth popping in if you’re in the area.

This place is nuts. Literally.

A bit expensive for what it is. But good time waster on a rainy day!!
Tbh my friends and I have been waiting to come here forever and we will definitely be telling all our friends to come here as well!

My friends and I stumbled upon this museum while walking around in Barcelona. It was actually pretty informative and interesting and... graphic to say the least. Highly recommend if you have the time and need something interesting to shake things up !!
Very informative museum. Friendly staff and you can take pictures and videos! If you are reserved,  I round not recommend going. Keep an open mind
Nice museum worth the visit if you came to Barcelona. Everything is sorted nicely with proper description, which makes the whole experience interesting.
Much more exciting and interesting than we expected! We learnt a lot. Would definitely recommend :) And the glass of champagne was lovely as well!
Different and exciting experience! The staff was superb - while we were there, the power went off. We were given a chance to visit the museum for free next day.
Very interesting history. Wish we had an audio component. Wonder where all of these artifacts came (cum) from
Loved the museum. Lots of exhibits and fun facts about sex throughout time! Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in Barcelona.
Very informative museum, really enjoyed my time here, highly recommend. Loved it here will be back with more friends
Really interesting, would recommend with friends if you’re around. Near plenty of restaurants and bars to go after, staff super friendly too.
This museum is actually very interesting and informative. I really enjoyed it here, recommend if you’re on a trip with friends.
it was very informative, i had a good laugh. recommend it if you’re looking for something to do here!
Interesting museum & lots of translation throughout the museum. Smoking area out the back and has shop
laugha good Wee laugh around a fun museum, good for couple who want a giggle.  Worth a visit but not a serious one
Very interesting! The set out was great! Lots of opportunities to take funny and memorable photos! And they have a student discount! Recommend!
Enjoyed this experience a lot. It was very interesting to learn about the history behind it. Would highly recommend to anyone interested in this aspect of it.
A fun activity to do in the evening as a laugh would recommend, good for anyone above the age of 18.
Very informative and interesting! Good for a spontaneous day out and very varied. Myself and my partner really enjoyed it.
If you have time..go to see..interesting and fun.information from all over the world... Not with childerns.
Very interesting place, from the past to present, old toys new toys, it's nice, exciting and funny! If you are in Barcellona why not come here?!

It is a great and taboo breaking museum. Really enjoyed the experience! Went with my cousin and we had a good time. It was nice to see how erotism has evolved among different places and through the years.
Very interesting museum. The history of sex and the animation's were our personal favourites! Worth a visit if in Barcelona
Gave me fresh understandings of sexual cultures around the world. Short tour but worth visiting in Barcelona.

We both found the museum Very informative and fun on a night out ! Deals with many taboos and kinks that you wouldn’t usually come across which I find very well done. Would definitely recommend to anyone interested in the history and open to these sorts of things !
Interesting collection, mostly photographs and posters. You can view all the collections in less than half an hour
I mean it’s a great fun if you go there with friends. A lot of dicks and laugh. It was worth its price
Really good fun and interesting . The world record section was fascinating !! Good value for money for students - only €10 🤩🤩

A fun start to our museum day with something a bit different. Was both a bit risqué at points while very respectful at others, when for example shedding some light on prostitution during war time. Plus, a glass of champagne, can't complain there
Good experience, i like it so much. easily illustrates through a very specific path very interesting things
Really interesting and informative! Information translated into 6 languages and there’s actually quite a decent amount of info that is given :)
It’s a very interesting and educational museum. You see the paintings and drawings of different cultures, where sex is represented.
Very nice museum it is really worth visiting here it is amazing how you see the difference in every year and styles!!

Although some things were quite shocking, such as the sketches in the garden, it was also quite interesting to see everything. Especially since it’s a really broad topic and they try to cover everything

Really cool museum! Many historical information with pictures, videos and sculptures. Audio guide not nessecery, would definitely reccomend to visit. No queque, so you can buy ticket at the door, but its way more expensive than online. Online ticket without audioguide is 8 euros while at the door you’re asked to pay 12 euros per person.

I wasn't expecting so much historical Informations and fascinating insights on human sexuality since the begining of age! Take your time to read every info, it is worth the knowledge, fun and never vulgar. I just wished the shop had some copies of the netsukes and etching. 
We will come again.
Very nice and full of interesting stuffs!so, if you are in town, pay a visit!!! It is not expansive !
Great little museum! Very informative, had a great time. Don’t be put off at all! Very well laid out
So much to see, and some things I never even knew existed! The cartoons are intriguing and some interesting facts. A must see when in Barcelona.

I was visiting my friend who lives In Barcelona and we went to visit the musem. There is a lot of pictures based on Kamasutra which was nice. Some sex machinies and gadgets. 
There was a gayroom missing and BDSM room could be developed more.
Really interesting, documenting sex and eroticism over the years, from first known photos to modern day records.

I found this museum to be very interesting. I've always been interested in the shyness surrounding sex. Growing up in the UK there has always been a timid approach to sex. Here I was interested in finding out about whether, historically, sex was a taboo subject, and what the trend has been over time. There's a lot of fascinating artifacts and information here, and it was worth the entrance fee (with/without the Barcelona card).
Would recommend to everyone. Went in a small group of 3, was very fun and informative. Great price and a great shop at the end
Very informative! Lots of pictures and videos. Staff is friendly. A little more money than I thought it would be
It was a fun place with a lot of information and fun facts. All in one: a great museum, which is a must visit!
It was a nice museum in the middle of the La Rambla. Interesting and funny at the same time to visit with friends
Leave your shyness outside and go for it!From very early times until nowadays,every scenario you’ve most probably gone through or not.A great place to visit for the most outrageously naughty couples.
Came to visit with my friends (all 20-somethings) just for a bit of a laugh, but it was actually really interesting and feel like we learnt a lot!
The erotic museum presents a lot about the history of sex, especially about the beggings of it. A great experience, at a reasonable price!
Very good place to have fun with friends and have a good known of the erotic world. Of someone wants to try or are interested to visit this place i would really recommend it to everyone.

Great fun. Lots to see and smell. Great history too. It was very insightful and it was a great end to my trip. I particularly enjoyed King Alfonso’s secret sex tapes. A must see for anyone that visits Barcelona.
Came to learn lots and proved to have lots of information. Very exciting and lots of content. Would definitely come again.
Amusing, informative and I learnt a lot from visiting the museum. Definitely worth going for those younger to learn about sex in more depth.
